Entry.JapaneseText: あのトーマって奴は、 なぜ、いつもサレと一緒に？
Entry.EnglishText: Why is Tohma always with Saleh?

Entry.JapaneseText: トーマが、自分勝手なサレを監視してるって 話を聞いた事があるけど……
Entry.EnglishText: I had heard that Tohma was keeping an eye on Saleh because he acts on his own whims, but...

Entry.JapaneseText: 二人のフォルスを連動させると、すっごく 強いからだって聞いたコトもあるヨ。
Entry.EnglishText: I've also heard that when they join Forces, they're really strong.

Entry.JapaneseText: 少なくともサレが好きで一緒に いるんじゃないって事は確かよね。
Entry.EnglishText: At the very least, he isn't with Saleh because he likes him.
